name: VoxRPG Lite
description:
Introduction:

This is the home of VoxRPG Lite, a simple and easy to use voxel-based RPG creation suite that will allow you to delve deeper into your potential thirst for voxel games and RPGs! With this game, you will be able to design 3D voxel objects and characters, combining poses as animations to flesh out an entire voxel-based RPG world to save, explore, or even export and give a friend for them to load into their game! Or, you can load up the included example game, edit it to your hearts content, and give it a play with all your well-earned advantages ;)

This project is a work-in-progress currently being developed for the Game By It's Cover Jam 2020; Based on the famicase submission "famidesigner deluxe" by Michael Shillingburg. Inspired by 3D Dot Game Heroes.

Controls:
  • WASD | Left Joystick - Move 3D Cursor Forward and Left/Right
  • Q/E | Left/Right Button - Move 3D Cursor Up/Down
  • Left/Right Shift | Left/Right Trigger - Nudge Mesh instead with above.
  • Right Joystick - Turn Camera - No alternative for keyboard/mouse!
  • Arrows | D-Pad - Move Color Palette Cursor
  • Space | A - Place a Voxel
  • Delete | B - Remove a Voxel
  • R | Y - Take Hovered Voxel's Color
  • Alt+F4 - Close the game
